doc.title: The Payback All-Star Revue
doc.plot: Jackson is Matthew Stoddard, who's mostly a copy boy at the Stone. There's a $100 million heist at the Vegas Riviera Casino, staged by an oddball band of faux musicians, and the ringleader, played by Stuart Townsend, insists that he'll surrender only after he can tell his story to Stoddard.
